titleStmt.title: Faire-virtue, the mistresse of Phil'arete. Written by George Wither
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Augustine Mathewes] for Iohn Grismand,

notesStmt.note: The roman numeral date is made with turned C's.
Running title reads: The mistresse of Phil'arete.
The last leaf bears "The stationers postscript" on recto.
A reissue, with cancel title page, of the edition without author's name in full in title.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
